name: ChrissCross
description:
Play as best friends: Chriss and Cross.
Join their adventure to build a new a club house. Puzzle through the levels to gather the materials needed!

Controls
-WASD for Chriss' character
-The arrow keys for Cross' character

Play both characters in this short 45 minute puzzle adventure!
Play locally with a friend or alone.

Stand on a button and watch a new path appear.

Follow us for future patches
Discord: https://discord.gg/7bUUQ5apNX
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Chriss_Cross_GM
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chriss.cross.game/
